data.title: Corporate & Family Fun in Fort Lauderdale
data.meta_description: Xtreme Action Park is open 7 days a Week! Monday to Thursday 11am to 10pm, Friday 11am to 11pm Saturday: 11am to Midnight and Sunday: 11am to 10pm.
data.meta_site_name: Xtreme Action Park | Corporate & Family Fun in Fort Lauderdale - Go Karting, Bowling, Roller Skating, VR, Fun Games, Teambuilding for Corporate & Family Entertainment In South Florida
data.text:
Please note that these hours will be subject to change at any time without notice. We recommend that you check back often for hours updates or changes.

Phone hours are Monday to Saturday from 9am to 6pm. Or you can email anytime 24/7 by clicking the link below:

From I-95: Take Exit 32 (Commercial Boulevard) and head West to Powerline Road (.2 miles). Make a right onto Powerline Road and Xtreme Action Park will be on the right (East) side.

From Turnpike: Take Exit at Commercial Boulevard and head East to Powerline Road. Make a left onto Powerline Road and Xtreme will be on the right (East) side.
